attributes.action: bring in longer sentences for murder, rape and child cruelty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need harder prison sentences for the people who disregard the rights of innocent, law abiding people in this country who are forgotten by the Law Lords and the British Government.  Judges should be allowed to give longer sentences. Vasectomys and sterilization should be mandatory for those who abuse and kill children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
